nodes.text: Seig Darklighter was a Jedi, commonly believed to have led the Jedi Rebellion, though the real Jedi commander was Luke Skywalker.
A different version of events has a man named Darklighter, a Padawan, discover the Bogan and teach the dark side to a group of pirates named the Sith, forming the Black Knights of the Sith.

The name Darklighter was eventually combined with Biggs, the name of a prince and Leia's brother in the rough draft (and Luke's brother in the first draft), to form a new, non-Jedi character named Biggs Darklighter.
